mapper.select:
SELECT CD.CD_ID , TO_CHAR(CD.CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRT_DT , CD.CRTR , TO_CHAR(CD.MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MDFY_DT , CD.MDFYR , CD.USE_YN , CD.DEL_YN , CD.CD_NM , CD.PRCDNC_CD_ID , PRCDNC_CD.CD_NM PRCDNCD_CD_NM FROM CMN_CD CD LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM CMN_CD WHERE DEL_YN = 'N') PRCDNC_CD ON CD.PRCDNC_CD_ID = PRCDNC_CD.CD_ID WHERE CD.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND CD.CD_NM LIKE '%' || #{cdNm} || '%'
AND CD.PRCDNC_CD_ID LIKE '%' || #{prcdncCdId} || '%'
ORDER BY CD.CD_ID DESC
SELECT CD_NM , CD_ID FROM CMN_CD WHERE PRCDNC_CD_ID IS NULL
SELECT CD_NM , CD_ID FROM CMN_CD WHERE PRCDNC_CD_ID = #{_parameter}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CMN_CD (CD_ID , CRT_DT , CRTR , MDFY_DT , MDFYR , USE_YN , DEL_YN , CD_NM , PRCDNC_CD_ID) VALUES (#{cdId} , SYSDATE , #{crtr} , SYSDATE , #{mdfyr} , NVL(#{useYn}, 'N') , 'N' , #{cdNm} , NVL(#{prcdncCdId}, NULL))
